source.name: "output_date_rate"
source.comment: "output a record every X times. default value is 5."

source.name: "atmosphere/theta-norm"
source.comment: "the ratio of at-altitude temperature over the sea level value"

source.name: "atmosphere/sigma-norm"
source.comment: "the ratio of at-altitude density over the sea level value"

source.name: "atmosphere/delta-norm"
source.comment: "the ratio of at-altitude pressure over the sea level value"

source.name: "atmosphere/a-norm"
source.comment: "the ratio of at-altitude sound speed over the sea level value"

source.name: "atmosphere/p-turb-rad_sec"
source.desc: "aero turbulence moment along the X axis"
source.comment: "aero turbulence moment in the body frame"

source.name: "atmosphere/q-turb-rad_sec"
source.desc: "aero turbulence moment along the Y axis"
source.comment: "aero turbulence moment in the body frame"

source.name: "atmosphere/r-turb-rad_sec"
source.desc: "aero turbulence moment along the Z axis"
source.comment: "aero turbulence moment in the body frame"

source.name: "atmosphere/n-turb-fps"
source.desc: "aero turbulence force for the north axis"
source.comment: "aero turbulence force in the local frame"

source.name: "atmosphere/n-turb-mps"
source.desc: "aero turbulence force for the north axis"
source.comment: "aero turbulence force in the local frame"

source.name: "atmosphere/e-turb-fps"
source.desc: "aero turbulence force for the east axis"
source.comment: "aero turbulence force in the local frame"

source.name: "atmosphere/e-turb-mps"
source.desc: "aero turbulence force for the east axis"
source.comment: "aero turbulence force in the local frame"

source.name: "atmosphere/d-turb-fps"
source.desc: "aero turbulence force for the down axis"
source.comment: "aero turbulence force in the local frame"

source.name: "atmosphere/d-turb-mps"
source.desc: "aero turbulence force for the down axis"
source.comment: "aero turbulence force in the local frame"

source.name: "forces/lod-norm"
source.comment: "aerodynamic lift force divided by aerodynamic drag force"

source.name: "forces/nlf-norm"
source.comment: "longitude force divided by gravity, it is 1 normally."

source.name: "forces/mag-nlf-total-norm"
source.comment: "total force divided by gravity, it is 1 normally."

source.name: "forces/nbz-total-norm"
source.comment: "total load in the body frame, it is -1 normally."
